General.Name: Los Andes Copper Limited
General.Description: Los Andes Copper Ltd. acquires, explores, and develops copper deposits in Canada and Chile. It operates through three segments: Mineral Exploration, Hydroelectric Project, and Corporate. The company holds 100% interest in the Vizcachitas copper, molybdenum, and silver porphyry project located north of Santiago, Region V, Chile. It is also involved in the development of a hydroelectric project. Los Andes Copper Ltd. was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada. Los Andes Copper Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Turnbrook Mining Limited.
General.Address: 580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6
